org.gwt.mosaic.ui.client.treetable
Interface HasFastTreeTableItems

All Known Implementing Classes:
FastTreeTable, FastTreeTableItem
public interface HasFastTreeTableItems

A widget that implements this interface contains FastTreeTableItem children and can add and remove them.

Method Summary
 void addItem(FastTreeTableItem item)
          Adds another item as a child to this one.
 FastTreeTableItem addItem(java.lang.String itemText)
          Adds a child tree item containing the specified text.
 FastTreeTableItem addItem(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget widget)
          Adds a child tree item containing the specified widget.
 FastTreeTableItem getChild(int index)
          Gets the child at the specified index.
 int getChildCount()
          Gets the number of children contained in this item.
 int getChildIndex(FastTreeTableItem child)
          Gets the index of the specified child item.
 void removeItem(FastTreeTableItem item)
          Removes one of this item's children.
